channel.title: The Discourse
channel.itunes:summary: Interfaith dialogue taken to the next level. Jewish, Arab (Muslim and Christian), and Black student intellectuals hold deep discussions on diverse topics. Affiliated with Detroit Center for Civil Discourse.
channel.itunes:author: Wayne State University Civil Discourse Fellowship

item.title: Meet the Discoursers
item.description: Welcome to The Discourse! We are a demographically diverse group of student intellectuals, members of the Wayne State University Civil Discourse Fellowship, committed to having deep, good-faith discussions on complex issues. In this introductory episode, four of us dig into our diverse backgrounds and ideological predispositions.
